attributes.action: Stop introduction of Blanket 50MPH Speed Limit on our roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enough is enough nanny state Government.  We do not want a blanket 50mph ban on our unrestricted roads.  Which will become a cash cow for this government.  Allow the people to speak and stop this injustice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
